text:
="preserve">Julio César Gandarilla Bermejo (1942/1943 – 24 November 2020) was a Cuban military official and politician. He was born in Matanzas, Cuba. He was a rear admiral for the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces. From 2017 until his death, he was the Minister of the Interior.
Gandarilla Bermejo died of a long-illness in Havana on 24 November 2020 at the age of 77.
